title: Syndra skin concept
body:
Sup guys, I came up with an idea for a Syndra skin concept. I think the fire theme would suite her well because its powerful and yeah. So anyways i attached a link to the concept i call 'Molten Syndra' or 'Wild fire Syndra' Yes i did take inspiration from the Zyra skin. I will also be adding a splash to it and other things. I hope some day Riot notices this ;-; 
I would also love to hear your opinions :3 
I also posted this on reddit too and my FB page, the links are below:
FB: http://hamzilla15.deviantart.com/art/Syndra-concept-559046444
REDDIT: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3k32ry/syndra_skin_concept/
This post will be updated so stay tuned!

replies.body: That is very nice, reminds me of Flame Attronacs from Elder Scrolls

Love the idea and the look, she definitely deserves a new one. 
Also how did you post a picture, they changed the boards again and when I try to create a post there is no more add an attachment option
This is sick i hope riot notices it

Nice! would love to see what all the abilities look like as well e.g.

http://am.leagueoflegends.com/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2015/june_2015/VFXDB/MissFortune_Arcade_large.jpg&resize=1536:
